SEARCH
Package warzone.state

Class Phase

java.lang.Object
warzone.state.Phase
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
GamePlay, MapEditor
public abstract class Phase extends Object implements Serializable
State of the State pattern. Here implemented as a abstract class. In this example, the states represent states in the board game Risk. There are many states, and even a hierarchy of states: Phase MapEdit phase (abstract) GamePlay (abstract) In each state, nextState() is defined so that it goes down in
See Also:

    • setTournamentMaxTurns

      public abstract void setTournamentMaxTurns(int p_maxTurns)
      Sets the maximum number of turns for each player in the tournament. If no player has won once this limit is reached, the game will end as a draw.
      Parameters:
      p_maxTurns - given max turns
